Class DrinkService

java.lang.Object
service.DrinkService
public class DrinkService extends Object
This class deals with drink interactions w/ db

      public void addOrderItem(OrderItem orderItem)

      Parameters:

    • closeOrder

      public void closeOrder(ArrayList<OrderItem> orderItems, Double totalPrice)
      This method adds the order to the database (to table orderhistory). This method will call addOrderItem for each orderitem to populate orderitem table.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - to add
      totalPrice - to add
